title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Gamification-Based Personalized Learning Design in Social Fields

context.prior_knowledge: Ability to utilize foundational learning tools and general comprehension of social phenomena
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design two social problem-solving scenarios incorporating gamification elements
Learners can select at least three gamification strategies aligned with their learning motivation types (explorer/collaborator/achiever, etc.)
Learners can achieve over 80% comprehension of social topics by completing five formative assessment tasks based on Bloom's revised taxonomy
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
